ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Check-Block-02: Are strict permissions set for cinder config files?
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: This test makes sure that /etc/cinder/ has mode 0640. If the target file or directory has an extended ACL, then it will fail the mode check.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: package_GConf2_installed
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The RPM package GConf2 should be installed.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: package_avahi_installed
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The RPM package avahi should be installed.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: package_dconf_installed
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The RPM package dconf should be installed.

ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The RPM package esc should be installed.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: package_gdm_installed
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The RPM package gdm should be installed.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: package_pam_ldap_removed
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The RPM package pam_ldap should be removed.

ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The RPM package prelink should be removed.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: package_samba-common_removed
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The RPM package samba-common should be removed.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Ensure /var/log/kube-apiserver Located On Separate Partition
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: If stored locally, create a separate partition for . If will be mounted from another system such as an NFS server, then creating a separate partition is not necessary at this time, and the mountpoint can instead be configured later.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Ensure /var/log/oauth-apiserver Located On Separate Partition
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: If stored locally, create a separate partition for . If will be mounted from another system such as an NFS server, then creating a separate partition is not necessary at this time, and the mountpoint can instead be configured later.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Ensure /var/log/openshift-apiserver Located On Separate Partition
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: If stored locally, create a separate partition for . If will be mounted from another system such as an NFS server, then creating a separate partition is not necessary at this time, and the mountpoint can instead be configured later.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: service_sssd_disabled
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The sssd service should be disabled if possible.

ns0:criteria.comment: package sssd-common removed or service and socket sssd are not configured to start
service and socket sssd are disabled

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: service_syslog_disabled
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The syslog service should be disabled if possible.

ns0:criteria.comment: package rsyslog removed or service and socket syslog are not configured to start
service and socket syslog are disabled

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: sshd_includes_config_files
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check presence of Include /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/*.conf in /etc/ssh/sshd_config

ns0:criteria.comment: Test conditions - presence of the file plus 0 extra definitions.

ns0:criterion.comment: Check that /etc/ssh/sshd_config contains a line with certain text

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Check pam_faillock Existence in system-auth
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check that pam_faillock.so exists in system-auth

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Check pam_pwquality Existence in system-auth
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check that pam_pwquality.so exists in system-auth

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Record Any Attempts to Run semanage
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Test if auditctl is in use for audit rules.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Record Any Attempts to Run semanage
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Test if augenrules is enabled for audit rules.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Record Events that Modify the System's Network Environment
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The network environment should not be modified by anything other than administrator action. Any change to network parameters should be audited.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Record Events that Modify the System's Network Environment
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The network environment should not be modified by anything other than administrator action. Any change to network parameters should be audited.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: 'log_group' Not Set To 'root' In /etc/audit/auditd.conf
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Verify 'log_group' is not set to 'root' in /etc/audit/auditd.conf.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Verify GRUB_DISABLE_RECOVERY Set to true
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: GRUB_DISABLE_RECOVERY set to 'true' in /etc/default/grub

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Specify Multiple Remote chronyd NTP Servers for Time Data
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Multiple chronyd NTP Servers for time synchronization should be specified.

ns0:criteria.comment: chrony.conf conditions are met

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT existance check
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check if GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT exists in /etc/default/grub.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Package sssd-common is installed
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Checks if package sssd-common is installed.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Package sudo is installed
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Checks if package sudo is installed.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Package systemd is installed
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Checks if package systemd is installed.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Package yum is installed
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Checks if package yum is installed.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: System uses zIPL
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Checks if system uses zIPL bootloader.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Check if the scan target is a container
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check for presence of files characterizing container filesystems.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Check if the scan target is a machine
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check for absence of files characterizing container filesystems.

ns0:extend_definition.comment: If environment is not a container, it is machine

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: No CD/DVD drive is configured to automount in /etc/fstab
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check the /etc/fstab and check if a CD/DVD drive is not configured for automount.

ns0:criterion.comment: Check if CD/DVD drive is not configured to automout in /etc/fstab

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Test for different architecture than s390x
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel/osrelease is not s390x

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Test that the architecture is s390x
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel/osrelease is s390x

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Device Files for Removable Media Partitions Does Not Exist on the System
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Verify if device file representing removable partitions exist on the system

ns0:criterion.comment: Check if removable partition really exists on the system

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: SSHD is not required to be installed or requirement not set
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: If SSHD is not required, we check it is not installed. If SSH requirement is unset, we are good.

ns0:criteria.comment: SSH not required or not set

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: SSHD is required to be installed or requirement not set
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: If SSHD is required, we check it is installed. If SSH requirement is unset, we are good.

ns0:criteria.comment: SSH required or not set

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: It doesn't matter if sshd is installed or not
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Test if value sshd_required is 0.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: OpenSSH Server is 7.4 or newer
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check if version of OpenSSH Server is equal or higher than 7.4

ns0:criteria.comment: OpenSSH Server version is equal or higher than 7.4

ns0:criterion.comment: Check if OpenSSH Server is equal or higher than 7.4

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Verify The SSSD Configuration File Exists
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The /etc/sssd/sssd.conf file should exist if it is in use.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: SSSD is configured to use LDAP
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Identification provider is not set to ad within /etc/sssd/sssd.conf

ns0:criterion.comment: Identification provider is not set to ad within /etc/sssd/sssd.conf

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Non-UEFI system boot mode check
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check if System boot mode is non-UEFI.

ns0:extend_definition.comment: Pass if System boot mode is non-UEFI

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: UEFI system boot mode check
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check if system boot mode is UEFI.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Test for 64-bit Architecture
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Generic test for 64-bit architectures to be used by other tests

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Test for aarch_64 Architecture
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Generic test for aarch_64 architecture to be used by other tests

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Test for PPC and PPCLE Architecture
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Generic test for PPC PPC64LE architecture to be used by other tests

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Test for s390_64 Architecture
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Generic test for s390_64 architecture to be used by other tests

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Test for x86 Architecture
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Generic test for x86 architecture to be used by other tests

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Test for x86_64 Architecture
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Generic test for x86_64 architecture to be used by other tests

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Check that file storing USBGuard rules exists and is not empty
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check that file storing USBGuard rules at /etc/usbguard/rules.conf exists and is not empty

ns0:criteria.comment: Check that file storing USBGuard rules exists and is not empty

ns0:criterion.comment: Check that the usbguard rules in either /etc/usbguard/rules.conf or /etc/usbguard/rules.d/ contain at least one non white space character.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Value of 'var_accounts_user_umask' variable represented as octal number
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Value of 'var_accounts_user_umask' variable represented as octal number

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Value of 'var_removable_partition' variable is set to '/dev/cdrom'
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Verify if value of 'var_removable_partition' variable is set to '/dev/cdrom'

ns0:criterion.comment: Check if removable partition value represents CD/DVD drive

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Value of 'var_umask_for_daemons' variable represented as octal number
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Value of 'var_umask_for_daemons' variable represented as octal number

Second octal digit of umask from var_accounts_user_umask

var_accounts_user_umask umask converted from string to a number
